title: The Rush Limbaugh Show Podcast
itunes:title: The Rush Limbaugh Show Podcast
description:
PODCAST SUMMARY HOUR 1:

McCarthy dumps Cheney, endorses Stefanik after she appeared on this show. Rush on the Never Trumpers: They don't care about results, only Trump's personality. Mitt Romney censured, booed by GOP group in Utah. Rush on Romney personification of the establishment. Rising prices, rising benefits killing the economy. James Golden to join the program this Wednesday to premiere a clip from his new podcast: Rush Limbaugh: The Man Behind the Golden EIB Microphone. Callers on Romney, Cheney.

PODCAST SUMMARY HOUR 2:

A year ago this week Rush predicted what Tony Fauci said yesterday. The cyber attack on the Texas oil pipeline. Rush on ransomware and why he supported Apple's decision not to give the FBI backdoor access to iPhones. Government isn't the answer to everything. Politics and the NFL. Kentucky Derby scandal. Rush on the politicization of sports, Lance Armstrong doping scandal, Ray Lewis deer antler spray controversy. Ohio Governor DeWine caught on camera breaking mask rules. Caller on the economy. EIB High Note preview.

PODCAST SUMMARY HOUR 3:

The Democrats are paying people not to work, but the Biden Commerce Secretary Gina Raimondo claims people are afraid to go back to work because of covid fear. Rush on how Democrats would sue covid to implement socialism, convince people they never need to work again. Biden says his economic plan is working. Rush on a Biden tweet about jobs. James Golden will play a clip from his new podcast on the show this Wednesday. Rush on the Democrat-inspired crime wave across America. EIB High Note: Former drug addict and criminal turns his life around by training falcons. Republicans should own stories of redemption. Universal basic income, unemployment extensions kill the incentive to work, causing labor shortage. Todd leaves a big tip.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

Follow Clay & Buck on YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/c/clayandbuck

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
